sentences.en: So as to prevent cheating , he was asked to reshuffle the cards.
sentences.cn: 为了防止作弊, 他重新洗牌.

sentences.en: The affair led to a mid - term Cabinet reshuffle ( = when the prime minister / president changes some of the people in the Cabinet ).
sentences.cn: 这次事件引发了內阁中途改组.

sentences.en: The enterprises merger or reshuffle the inventory assets to optimize the resources distribution.
sentences.cn: 企业通过并购,存量资产重组,进而推进资源优化配置.

sentences.en: The newspaper's account of the so - called reshuffle of the financial ministry was a complete fiction.
sentences.cn: 报纸对 所谓 的财政部人事改组的报道完全是捏造的.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister announced a reshuffle of his Cabinet.
The prime minister told reporters this morning that he plans to reshuffle his entire cabinet.
sentences.cn: 今天早上，首相告诉记者他打算全面改组内阁。

sentences.en: The reshuffle left China Mobile competing with China Telecom and China Unicom.
sentences.cn: 重组使得中国移动展开与中国电信和中国联通的竞争.

sentences.en: There is a periodic reshuffle of our company staff.
sentences.cn: 本公司有定期的人事异动.

sentences.en: There was a reshuffle of cabinet officers.
sentences.cn: 内阁官员的职位做了重新安排.

sentences.en: This time it took eight minutes for the reshuffle to work.
sentences.cn: 这次用了8分钟就发挥作用了.

sentences.en: When New Medical Reform aroses industry reshuffle, how should medicine enterprises reply?
sentences.cn: 新医改引发行业洗牌, 医药企业如何应对?

sentences.en: While the real estate industry to reshuffle a storm coming.
sentences.cn: 京城房地产行业的一场重新洗牌风暴即将来临.

sentences.en: Who let out the details of the reshuffle in the department?
sentences.cn: 是谁泄漏了部门重组的细节?

sentences.en: Yesterday's reshuffle also marks the end of Mr Green's dominant role ruing the bank.
sentences.cn: 昨日的调整也标志着葛霖在汇丰主宰地位的终结.

words.tran_cn: 重新洗牌；改组；重作安排

trans.tran_en: when the jobs of people who work in an organization are changed around, especially in a government

trans.tran_cn: 重新洗牌；改组；重作安排
trans.tran_en: When a political leader reshuffles the ministers in a government, he or she changes their jobs so that some of the ministers change their responsibilities

trans.tran_cn: 改组，重新洗牌，重作安排
